title: iFoncier Land Registry Burkina Faso
description: Burkina Faso is facing acute social tensions and increasingly violent and deadly community conflicts partly due to a failed land management
solution: Create a blockchain-based land registry solution to expose Cardano in Burkina and to help reduce social tensions due to poor land management
experience: Larba Nadieba is an ICT Expert with a focus on emerging technologies in Africa. As a social entrepreneur he created a blockchain initiative.
